For justice, peace for Crescentia, and their lost allies, you went into the Bastion of Lok to eliminate the cultists.

You wiped them out, and killed their leader Murdranak.
The report you brought revealed the location of the Bastion of Lok and gave us the name of their commander—{@LinkCreature:487#101}. Get your final briefing, and head out."I will."

First, we need to clear the way for your backup.
Basilisks are wandering the Bestial Vale, and they're no small threat.

, I want you to clear the path for us.

You may want to enhance your skills so as to properly face bigger threats.

The easiest way to do so is by using glyphs.

Glyphs are activated by glyph points, which you earn every time you level up.

Every skill has a selection of useful glyphs with you learn it, and you can get more powerful glyphs from Glyph Boxes, specialty shops or leveling up.

==================================
Open your skill window to activate glyphs.
==================================

If you activate the wrong glyph by mistake, just reset your glyph points.

When you get more powerful glyphs later in your career, they will replace the ones you learn today."Thanks."

One more thing!

Go to Ausdan after you finish fighting Basilisks.

I'm heading back to Crescentia.

Good luck!

Good for you!

Remember that how skill works changes depending on what glyphs you choose.

Over time, you'll settle on the best combinations of skills and glyphs for your combat style."Thanks."

Great!

Don't forget to go to Ausdan after you finish fighting Basilisks.

I'm heading back to Crescentia.

Good luck!

! You're back!
Looks like you're going to the Bastion of Lok."Indeed I am."

The entrance is right over there. Take the path on my left to the cave entrance. I've seen those cultists going in and out, probably via a teleportal. Grapine's inside in disguise.

Those wretches killed most of my unit—don't be gentle with them!

You're from the Valkyon Federation! Seems like my report was delivered safely.

Where are your backup units?"They..."

We must destroy the Bastion of Lok, so that this never happens again.

I'll tell you everything I know.

This teleportal will exit Bastion of Lok and transport you to the Bestial Vale.

Go to Isla and tell her the news.

==================================
The dungeon may not automatically reset if you exit after completing it.

If necessary, you can reset the dungeon with the command '/dungeonreset' or by using the instance reset button.
==================================

You've cleared out the Bastion of Lok?

Thank you. Our men will be able to rest in peace now. Without the devas and scions, Arcadia will be safe for a while.

Please go to Crescentia and report this to Jodoc. Use this teleport scroll if you want to get there faster.

This news brings me great comfort.

Dismissed!
